Name: Hot And Lovely 2
About the game: This is a casual origami game, which can exercise your hands-on ability. You can show your wisdom to girls through origami. With the continuous improvement of your origami technology, you can capture girls' hearts after completing the checkpoint. In the game, we also added the 'P Key' for you to pass the customs quickly We have 40 different levels for you to experience. In the game, you must fold the paper as much as possible into the specified cute graphics in the specified origami times. The game is very challenging from easy to difficult.
